name: Burg_110
culture_notes: Island Creole dialect mixed with Coastal Tongues
sea-blessed festivals tied to star-calendar rites
constraints: No instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
Long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents and specialized labor
notes: Population unknown; transient maritime crews dominate
Navigational auguries used but cannot replace charts and seamanship
